eu.ist.astra.tmn
Interface ITagManagerNode

All Known Implementing Classes:
TagManagerNode
public interface ITagManagerNode

Interface for the TagManagerNode Provides functionality for private tags. The methods provided will be available through web service calls. Adapted for Astra

Version:
0.3
Author:
Christian Laverton, modified by David Rozas & Alfredo Perez

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

addTag

boolean addTag(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String appId,
               java.lang.String userId)
Creates a new private tag Adapted for Astra.

Parameters:
name - Tag name
appId - Application identifier
userId - User identifier
Returns:
True if the operation was successful, false otherwise.

getTags

java.lang.String[] getTags(java.lang.String appId,
                           java.lang.String userId,
                           int limit)
Finds and returns all the private tags for the given application for this user.

Parameters:
appId - Application identifier
userId - User Identifier
limit - Limit on number of results returned. If <=0, then all the results are returned
Returns:
List of private tags resulting from query, empty array if there no tags for it, or null if there was any problem with the DB.

deleteTag

boolean deleteTag(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String appId,
                  java.lang.String userId)
Deletes a private tag

Parameters:
name - Tag name
appId - Application identifier in standard ASTRA format
userId - User identifier
Returns:
True if the process was successful, false otherwise.
